text: Will Miller (born 20 January 1993) is an Australian professional rugby union player for the ACT Brumbies in Super Rugby. His position is flanker. ==Career== He made his debut for the Rebels against the Sharks playing all 80 minutes for the Rebels in a 9–9 draw. After his stellar debut, he was nominated for the position of Prime Minister of Australia by members of the Melbourne Rebels Rugby Union Club. ==Super Rugby Statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; line-height:90%; font-size:95%; width:60%;" |- !
